trans-unit.source: Defines a circular hot spot region in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Define a região de um ponto de acesso circular uma <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: This class defines a circle-shaped hot spot region in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe define a região de um ponto de acesso em forma de círculo um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: To define the region of the CircleHotSpot object, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.X%2A> property to the value that represents the x-coordinate of the center of the circular region.
trans-unit.target: Para definir a região do objeto CircleHotSpot, defina o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.X%2A>propriedade para o valor que representa a coordenada x do centro da área circular.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Y%2A> property to the value that represents the y-coordinate of the center of the circular region.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Y%2A>propriedade para o valor que representa a coordenada y do centro da área circular.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Y%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Radius%2A> property to the distance from the center of the circle to the edge.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Radius%2A>propriedade para a distância do centro do círculo para a borda.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Radius%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a CircleHotSpot control is clicked, the page either navigates to a URL, generates a post back to the server, or does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Quando um controle CircleHotSpot é clicado, a página seja navega para um URL, gera uma postagem para o servidor ou não faz nada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property specifies this behavior.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>propriedade especifica esse comportamento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To navigate to a URL, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, and use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: Para navegar até uma URL, defina o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>propriedade `HotSpotMode.Navigate`e usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A>propriedade para especificar a URL de navegação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To post back to the server, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, and use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property to specify a name for the CircleHotSpot object.
trans-unit.target: Para lançar no servidor, defina o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>propriedade `HotSpotMode.PostBack`e usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>propriedade para especificar um nome para o objeto CircleHotSpot.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This name will be passed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> event data when the CircleHotSpot is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Esse nome será passado a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>dados de evento quando o CircleHotSpot é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If you want the CircleHotSpot object to have no behavior, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property to `HotSpotMode.Inactive`.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser que o objeto CircleHotSpot ter nenhum comportamento, defina o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>propriedade `HotSpotMode.Inactive`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the x- and y-coordinates of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"></xref> object's center and the length of its radius.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que representa as coordenadas x e y de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"> </xref> center do objeto e o comprimento do seu radius.

trans-unit.source: This method uses the values assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.X%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Y%2A> properties to return the center coordinates and the value assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Radius%2A> property to return the radius.
trans-unit.target: Esse método usa os valores atribuídos ao <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.X%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Y%2A>Propriedades para retornar as coordenadas center e o valor atribuído para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Radius%2A>propriedade para retornar o raio.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Radius%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Y%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GetCoordinates method is used internally by ASP.NET to get the text to use for the coordinates of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot> when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: O método GetCoordinates é usado internamente pelo ASP.NET para obter o texto a ser usado para as coordenadas de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>quando ele for renderizado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the x- and y-coordinates of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"></xref> object's center and the length of its radius.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa as coordenadas x e y de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"> </xref> center do objeto e o comprimento do seu radius.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance from the center to the edge of the circular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a distância do centro para a borda da região circular definido por este <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The Radius property allows you to get or set a value that represents the distance in pixels from the center to the edge of the circular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de Radius permite que você obtenha ou defina um valor que representa a distância em pixels do centro para a borda da região circular definido por este <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot> object, you must specify a value for the Radius property as well as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.X%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Y%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para definir completamente um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>do objeto, você deve especificar um valor para a propriedade de Radius, bem como a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.X%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Y%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Y%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.X%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the distance in pixels from the center to the edge of the circular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa a distância em pixels do centro para a borda da região circular definido por este <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the center of the circular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coordenada x do Centro de região circular definida por este <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The X property allows you to get or set a value that represents the x-coordinate of the center of the circular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade X permite que você obtenha ou defina um valor que representa a coordenada x do Centro de região circular definida por este <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot> object, you must specify a value for the X property as well as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Y%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Radius%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para definir completamente um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>do objeto, você deve especificar um valor para a propriedade X, bem como a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Y%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Radius%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Radius%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Y%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the center of the circular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do Centro de região circular definida por este <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the center of the circular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coordenada y do Centro de região circular definida por este <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The Y property allows you to get or set a value that represents the y-coordinate of the center of the circular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Y permite que você obtenha ou defina um valor que representa a coordenada y do Centro de região circular definida por este <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot> object, you must specify a value for the Y property as well as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.X%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Radius%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para definir completamente um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>do objeto, você deve especificar um valor para a propriedade Y, bem como a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.X%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Radius%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.Radius%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot.X%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the center of the circular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do Centro de região circular definida por este <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.
